how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.How To Use Viori Shampoo Bar:.-Start by soaking your hair with warm-hot water..-Rub the bar in your palm for a few seconds..-Gently rub the bar all over hair in small, circular motions..-Next, quickly wet your hair for just a few seconds..-Massage your scalp and hair for a couple of minutes..-And lastly, rinse thoroughly with warm-hot water...How To Use Viori Conditioner Bar:.-Start by soaking your hair with warm-hot water..-Rub the bar in your palm for a few seconds..-Gently rub the bar all over in straight, continuous motions..-Massage your scalp and hair for a couple of minutes..-Let it sit on your hair for one to two minutes..-And lastly, rinse thoroughly with warm-hot water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After my daughter and I used this product (about two weeks later, after using three times head washing and conditioners a week), it left soap grime in the bathtub. I have to scrub daily to avoid dealing with soap bars that flake out when they come too low. I wish the company had a soap saver bag to reduce soap grime or could specifically reformulate the soap to avoid it.
